plays.text: Goal scored by Ales Kotalik assisted by J.P. Dumont
Penalty to Chris Phillips 2 minutes for Tripping Vaclav Varada
Penalty to Taylor Pyatt 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding the Stick Daniel Alfredsson
Goal scored by Shaun Van Allen assisted by Marian Hossa
Penalty to Dmitri Kalinin 2 minutes for Hooking Magnus Arvedson served by Martin Gelinas
Penalty to Alexei Zhitnik 2 minutes for Holding Shaun Van Allen
Penalty to Radek Bonk 2 minutes for Tripping Denis Hamel
Goal scored by Ales Kotalik assisted by Stu Barnes and James Patrick
